content.rendered:
Kujtim Morina
Account Manager

Kujtim Morina

Aralytiks

Session: BALKONNECT PITCHING EVENT

Besart Hajrizi is a distinguished academic and innovation strategist, currently serving as a university lecturer in Innovation Management and an esteemed Associate at the Insta Innovation Center. His expertise lies in advancing Sustainability and Digital Transformation initiatives at Pllana Capital. Hajrizi is deeply involved in the implementation of the 5P Business Strategy, guiding the centers mission towards integrated and impactful growth.

Company Profile

Introduction
Strategically positioned in Switzerland and Kosovo, Aralytiks is a leading provider of cutting-edge data analytics and business intelligence solutions. Our commitment to excellence and efficiency is reflected in our strategic presence across these two locations. We pride ourselves on offering tailored services that empower businesses to harness the full potential of their data, driving operational success and informed decision-making.
________________________________________
Our Mission
At Aralytiks, our mission is to excel in the data analytics and business intelligence industry by delivering high-quality, tailored products and services to our valued customers. We operate with a global perspective, aiming to make a meaningful impact in the countries where we operate.
________________________________________
Our Vision
We aspire to be a prominent global player in the field of Business Intelligence and data analytics solutions. Our goal is to achieve this by delivering top-tier BI solutions that empower our clients with cutting-edge data insights and analytics capabilities. In parallel, we are committed to fostering a dynamic and fulfilling work environment that enables our team to excel in delivering exceptional BI services.
________________________________________
Core Expertise
1. Data Warehouse
Unlock the power of your data with our comprehensive data warehouse services. Our expert team designs, implements, and manages robust data infrastructures tailored to your business needs.
2. Data Integration
We integrate your data from disparate sources into a single, unified view, providing you with a holistic understanding that supports better decision-making.
3. Reporting & Visualization
We create clear, concise, and insightful reports and visualizations that effectively communicate data-driven insights to your stakeholders, aiding in more informed decision-making.
4. Application Development
Our team develops custom applications that cater to your specific business requirements. With expertise across a range of technologies, we ensure that the right solution is delivered for your needs.
5. Data Analytics
By analyzing your data, we help you uncover patterns and trends, enabling you to identify opportunities for improvement and make more strategic decisions.
6. Machine Learning
Our team develops and deploys machine learning models that automate tasks and make predictions, giving you an edge in forecasting future business outcomes.
________________________________________
Team and Departments

Currently, Aralytiks consists of a dedicated team of 60 professionals based in Kosovo, along with 5 experts in our Switzerland office. Our key departments include:

Data Integration
Data Reporting
Data Apps Development
Product Management
HR and Internal Services
